Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: palm of the hand, with the focus on one of the activities that are performed with the hands: to hold someone against that person's will; = condition of being under the malevolent control of another person or group
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans feel affection for others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which deities cause humans to be strong in a general sense
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge

Node.gloss: to take refuge|to find refuge|to find shelter
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals who find themselves in difficult circumstances go to a certain location, ► in order to find protection or safety

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

Node.gloss: (God as a) stronghold|(God as a) refuge
Node.definition: = a reference to God characterizing him as someone who provides security
= state in which humans or deities are considered worthy of praise
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= state in which someone is surrounded on all sides

= rope tied into a noose, attached to the other end to a bent bough or small tree that springs upright and tightens the noose around the victim when the trap is sprung; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= process by which humans or animals stop living
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= state that is likely to result in death ◄ as a consequence of bad behavior
= causative process by which a creature or object causes someone else to be in deep distress

= rope tied into a noose, attached to the other end to a bent bough or small tree that springs upright and tightens the noose around the victim when the trap is sprung; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
literally: to go around; hence: = state in which objects are located all around a person or animal

= action by which humans meet other humans that are travelling from one location to another ► either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ often extended to describe certain events that happen in people's lives
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= process by which humans or animals stop living
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

Node.gloss: to shake|to toss about|to be turbulent|to stagger
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects move up and down or to and fro

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it; sometimes used in a somewhat figurative sense to denote the foundations of heaven and earth
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

Node.gloss: to shake|to toss about|to be turbulent|to stagger
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects move up and down or to and fro
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= carbonized material resulting from heating wood, ► and used for cooking or warming
= process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire
= causative action by which deities cause a relatively straight object into a curve

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence
= process by which an object moves through the air
= action by which a bird moves swiftly downwards ► in order to capture its prey; ≈ often used metaphorically to refer to an army attacking the enemy
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

Node.gloss: to place (in a position)|to make|to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, and fear
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= pellets of frozen rain falling from the sky; ≈ associated with destruction

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor
= pellets of frozen rain falling from the sky; ≈ associated with destruction

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= causative action by which humans or deities shoot something at a particular target
literally: arrow; hence: = visible electric discharge between cloud and ground, shaped and moving like an arrow and considered to consist of fire
= process by which bright flashes of light are seen between clouds and the ground or within clouds, often accompanied by thunder; ≈ regarded as fire from heaven and arrows or spears from God
see רבב (רבב)|= causative action by which humans launch an arrow or a similar projectile

Node.gloss: to throw in a panic|to rout
Node.definition: = causative process by which deities cause humans to be overwhelmed with fear and flee

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
= bottom of a body of water

Node.gloss: to be laid bare|to become visible
Node.definition: = process by which an object becomes visible because other objects that used to cover them are removed
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it; sometimes used in a somewhat figurative sense to denote the foundations of heaven and earth
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans
= action by which humans or deities speak to animals, humans, deities, or natural objects in anger, in order to express their displeasure and cause them to change their behavior

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to be strong|to be powerful|to prevail
Node.definition: = state in which humans have political and/or military strength

Node.gloss: to approach|to come before|to stand before|to confront
Node.definition: = action by which humans place themselves in front of individuals or groups, facing either forward or backward, ► and either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ sometimes used figuratively in situations where humans come before God in worship, or where God confronts enemies, or when certain conditions are personified

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= extremely difficult circumstances ► resulting in grief, poverty, sickness, and/or death
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans
= action by which humans or deities act towards a person in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state in which something is free of dirt or things that are regarded as pollutants; ≈ often used figuratively to describe being free of guilt
literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation

Node.gloss: to repay|to pay back|to punish|to reward
Node.definition: literally: to send back (to someone); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities case (other) humans or deities to receive the appropriate return for their actions, which can be either good or bad
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, ► resulting in a state of guilt
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
= pattern of behavior required from someone by somebody in authority

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

Node.gloss: to repay|to pay back|to punish|to reward
Node.definition: literally: to send back (to someone); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities case (other) humans or deities to receive the appropriate return for their actions, which can be either good or bad
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state in which something is free of dirt or things that are regarded as pollutants; ≈ often used figuratively to describe being free of guilt
literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

Node.gloss: to show oneself loyal|to show oneself faithful
Node.definition: = action wherby deities act with loyalty (חֶסֶד)
primarily found in poetic contexts: = human being; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality
= action by which someone carefully examines oneself in order to evaluate one's behavior and make improvements where necessary
= action by which someone does what is right to someone else
literally: to be crooked (of a person); hence: = state in which humans lack integrity in everything they think or do

Node.gloss: to treat (someone) according to (his own) crookedness
Node.definition: = action by which deities act like humans that are intent on outwitting, tricking, and deceiving other humans
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: afflicted, poor; hence: = a class of people that do not think highly of themselves, ◄ usually as a result of poverty or other kinds of suffering
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to cause to shine|to give light to|to light up|radiant|resplendent
Node.definition: = action that causes something to emit or to reflect light; ≈ associated with well being and wisdom

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative process by which someone causes an object to give out or reflect light

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army|= a raised strip of earth or other material
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which someone moves forward at a relatively high speed while jumping over any obstacles on the way
= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection and security; ≈ associated with insurmountable obstacles
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: tested; hence: = state in which the words of deities have proven to be true and reliable, ◄ as a precious metal has been tested by a goldsmith and proven to be pure

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= particle indicating that a certain state is not true or that an event does not take place without the involvement of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= marker indicating that an object or event is not included in a range of objects or events
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= to tie a belt or girdle around someone else's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming someone for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to clothe people with certain characteristics and qualities, such as joy, strength, and courage

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= female of אַיָּל (אַיָּל)
literally: the back (of an area); hence: = the highest situated parts of a certain location, often representing the entire location
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= a yellowish brown alloy of copper with up to one third tin, ≈ regarded as a hard and difficult to bend
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

Node.gloss: to enlarge (someone's) steps > to clear the way (for someone)
Node.definition: literally: to enlarge (someone's) steps; hence: = causative action by which deities make humans successful in their undertakings
= joint between the leg and the foot
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= action by which humans succeed to catch up with other humans after having pursued them
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which humans stop moving into a certain direction and start moving back into the direction they came from
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= literally: to finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance
= action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= to tie a belt or girdle around someone else's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming someone for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to clothe people with certain characteristics and qualities, such as joy, strength, and courage

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
literally: to cause to go down on (their) knees; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause their enemies to be struck down in battle, collapse and die
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to destroy|to wipe out|to annihilate|to silence|to consume
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events remove (other) humans from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, sickness, strong emotions, or (possibly) direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

= wet soil;◄ moistened by rain or because of its proximity to a body of water; ► can be used for pottery or bricks; ≈ regarded as cheap, easily obtainable and workable material for making basic items; otherwise as a valueless substance or an obstacle for movement
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
= causative action by which humans or deities reduce an object to fine particles; ≈ sometimes used figuratively to denote the destruction of a kingdom

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= person associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= action by which someone recognizes someone else's superiority, ◄ described as diminishing oneself before this person
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= person associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= process by which humans lose courage when confronted with a formidable opponent
= state/process by which humans shake involuntarily, ◄ caused by fear
exact meaning unknown; probably: = a type of fortification

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong and so find relief from their anger
= action or process by which a nation gains control over someone else, usually involving violence
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
literally: to make high; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities grant an elevated status to humans in the eyes of other people
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= causative process by which a deity causes events to increase in intensity
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
